law.catch_line: A license authorizes the licensee to operate a child care center while the license is effective....

section.section: A license authorizes the licensee to operate a child care center while the license is effective.
A license authorizes the licensee to operate a child care center that offers or provides child care regardless of the time of day.

text.section: Unless the Department first approves the change, a licensee may not make any substantial addition to or other change in a building or plant of the child care center or a change in its facilities that could affect materially any condition under which the license was issued.
